title: Holiday Greetings Cyrillically
content:

author: dezcom

comments.content:
“Holiday Greetings Cyrillically”

... Not to mention cryptically!

Sorry, я не понимаю по-русскии.

(’Course, when I say that people don’t believe me; I need a worse Russian accent. ☺)

—Joel
Isn’t there a Russian saying “if you can read my handwriting you’ve drunk too much vodka”? If not there should be.

I think it says, “then you have not drunk ENOUGH vodka” :-)

ChrisL
